changeSet.createView: SELECT dn.discrepancy_note_id, 'now'::text::date - (( SELECT discrepancy_note.date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE discrepancy_note.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id AND discrepancy_note.discrepancy_note_id = (( SELECT max(discrepancy_note.discrepancy_note_id) AS max FROM discrepancy_note WHERE discrepancy_note.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id AND dn.resolution_status_id <> 4 AND dn.resolution_status_id <> 5)))) AS days, (( SELECT discrepancy_note.date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE discrepancy_note.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id AND discrepancy_note.discrepancy_note_id = (( SELECT max(discrepancy_note.discrepancy_note_id) AS max FROM discrepancy_note WHERE discrepancy_note.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id)))) - dn.date_created AS age FROM discrepancy_note dn WHERE dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL;
